{{year-header}}
==January==
*'''[[5 January|5]]''' - [[Hans Conried]], who voiced [[Thorin]] in [[The Hobbit (1977 film)|''The Hobbit'' (1977 film)]], dies.
*'''[[28 January|28]]''' - [[The Old English Exodus|''The Old English'' Exodus]], by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is published.
* '''[[28 January|28]]''' - ''[[Angmar: Land of the Witch King]]'' is published.
==February==
*'[[The Tengwar Numerals]]', an article by [[Christopher Tolkien]] is published in ''[[Quettar 13]]''

==April==
* '''?''' - [[Amon Hen 55|''Amon Hen'' 55]] is published.
==June==
* '''[[21 June|21]]''' - Actor [[Benjamin Walker]] is born.
* '''[[28 June|28]]''' - Artist [[Ray Dillon]] is born.
* '''?''' - [[Mallorn 18|''Mallorn'' 18]] is published.

==August==
* '''[[13 August|13]]-[[16 August|16]]''' - [[Mythcon 13]].
* '''[[14 August|14]]''' - [[Dorothy Whitelock]], former colleague of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], dies. 
* '''?''' - [[Amon Hen 57|''Amon Hen'' 57]] is published.

==September==
* '''[[19 September|19]]''' - The article "[[The Sunday Times Magazine 19 September 1982|The Return of Tolkien]]" is published in ''The Sunday Times Magazine''.
* '''[[20 September|20]]''' - ''[[Mr. Bliss]]'' is published in the UK.
* '''[[24 September|24]]-[[26 September|26]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1982]].
==October==
* '''?''' - [[Amon Hen 58|''Amon Hen'' 58]] is published.

==November==
* '''?''' - [[Melbourne House]] publishes [[The Hobbit (1982 video game)|''The Hobbit'' (1982 video game)]].
==December==
* '''?''' - [[Amon Hen 59|''Amon Hen'' 59]] is published.
* '''?''' - [[Mallorn 19|''Mallorn'' 19]] is published.

==?==
* '''?''' - Artist [[Marya Filatova]] is born.
* '''?''' - ''[[1983 Fantasy Calendar]]'' released.
* '''?''' - ''[[An Artist's Interpretation of Middle Earth]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Umbar: Haven of the Corsairs]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[The Court of Ardor]]'' is published.
